Message:
Playing with you
fluffy white Masters
is fun and all...
but I gotta go back to my home.

So, thank you sooo much
for playing with me,
fluffy white Masters!

Huh? You all wanna
play some more?

After you leave home,
say, “I’m heading out,”
and play a lot with your friends,

you’re supposed to come
back home and say, “I’m back.”

So, bye-bye!
Let’s play again one day!

Uh-oh... Did all
the Masters just disappear,
along with the big white fluff?

...Looks like it’s time for
everyone to go home, huh.
I guess I’ll go back too.
